values:
sorry i haven't updated in a while. i've been busy. i just wanted to leave you this note:

this is a time to reflect on the past year. the 365 days that flew by as if nothing. the important and the not so important.

i'm taking this time to really look back at the year. all the great people i've met and the wonderful things they've done. i realize how lucky i am to be me. i wouldn't want to be anyone elce. you all make my life complete! even tho there are days when i think life isn't worth it anymore, i can always count on a smiling face to lift my spiritsa and carry me through another day. 

this world is what you make it. the people i've met this year made my world a much better place. the things you all have done to help me cannot be repaid in materials. if i don't give each and everyone of you a hug, then i'll personally beat myself up! lol.

this is yet another extravagant thank you note to each and every one of you! there are many more who will never see this journal entry! to them i send my best wishes and will personally tell them! 

YOU GUYS ARE THE BEST!! 

love eternally,
Melissa
aka- the most loved person in the world!
http://freedomfighter4.livejournal.com/16412.html

hey guys... i am soo sorry that i haven't posted in a while. things have been hectic. we've been cleaning like crazy to get ready for Thanksgiving. i can't wait!! it is soo much fun when my family gets together!!! its one big party!! lol
-------------
ok... update on the guy issue... he totally understood where i was coming from. i don't think he stopped liking me tho.. but he called me shallow. HELLO!! doing drugs is a big thing.. how can you call someone shallow for not wanting to be associated with that. ok.. i just needed to say that. but he and i are cool now! lol... OTHER GUY PROBLEM!! ok.. earlier.. WAY earlier.. i told you about mike. well he came up today. it took me a lot of energy to stay away from him. if he thinks that i'm gonna fall on my knees and kiss his feet, he's got another thing coming to him. he uses me for whenever his romantic life is at a slump. I'M TIRED OF IT!! he needs to eigther stay with me or not because i'm tired of waiting for him. grr.... i hate him! you know how theres that one person that you can't stand what he/she does, but ur drawn to them anyway. thats the way i feel about mike. and i hate myself for it. ok.. done with that.. END OF STORY... NEXT PAGE IN MY LIFE PLEASE!!
------------
I GOT MY LETTERMAN JACKET!! i was soo excited when i got it... its nice and warm. i'm wearing it now. i have a phobia that if i take it off it might burst into flames or something.. i know.. i'm weird... well.. i guess that's everything thats happened to me!! i'll respond later!!
~Mel 
Aka: Poms

hey guys.. today has been great! i found out from a unidentified source that the guy i like COULD like me back... but i found from another unidentified source that he cheats on his gf's! i'm soo confused! i don't know what to do! if i say yes.. i have the risk of being hurt... and if i say no... then well... i never woulda known what woulda happened if i said yes! i need advice! other than that... my life has been o so boring! my mom finally agreed to let be go to the formal.. cuz of ACC's the next morning! i can't wait! *giggles!* i love my life... at least the unboring parts of it.. which is about 10% to 15%. anywho! I'M STILL HAPPY FOR MY HOMEGRL TRACY AND HER INTERESTING BOYFRIEND TIM! you guys are great! ok well.. neway.. i'm sitting here trying to find something to do.. hopefully someone will read this and answer my prayers! i've decided to finally get a job this summer.. good bye fun! lol... i need the money for gas! i am soo proud of my buddy nick.. he got his job at best buy and hasn't gotten fired! we need to go visit him and say hello!hm... well.. i think thats all i can think of! CHO!

I have absolutely no feeling right now. i am too embarassed for words! fie on you larissa and ashleigh for making me wear this whore costume! lol... i like your dress larissa! ashleigh- i'm still sorry, but i'mn glad you're talking to me again! i love you! lol.. well.. i must be off! obviously, i'm loving (refering to below!)!
You're the loving smile,the one that is entirely

person.You really can't get them out of your
head,but then,you don't really want to.

hey guys. i understand that a past post i wrote upset the people they were wrote about. for that i am truly sorry. i was frustrated with those 2 people at the time and needed somewhere to vent before i exploded. this was the first place. i am saddened that the truth has hurt these people so much and that i am the person who exposed it. i also understand that this site was not the best place to write that about people. i need to know that they forgive me.. but forgivness is a hard thing to give. so don't forgive me for my actions, just start talking to me again! you're friendships mean the world to me. (you're the only people i have in english! lol.. jp.. u mean everything to me even outside of english.) i just wanna know that i can still talk to them, that they will treat me like a human again... to know that i can talk to them and they won't get mad. i wanna let one of them know that the reason i didn't confess to her face is because it's impossible to tell her ANYTHING to her face without causing the third world war. i also wanna let her know that she DOES have friends that care about her. i care about her even tho i did what i did. i wasn't thinking strait. she sould understand. she even told me that when she's frustrated or sad, she doesn't think strait, so i guess you'd understand. if you ever read this, respond or call me! i need to talk to you!
:'( (*tear*)

oh mi god! i am soo pissed off! 2 cirtian pple are getting on my nerves. one of which is totally throwing her "adhd" out of proportion, blaming everything bad that happens! and oh, if you read this and don't like it... deal! someone has to tell you! ADHD SOOO DOES NOT CAUSE IMMATURITY! it only causes you not to focus and YOU DON'T HAVE TROUBLE FOCUSING! i can hold a normal conversation with you and you have no trouble staying on topic. i think you're just naturally immature! oh.. and if you're reading this, you can't get mad, because EVERYONE KNOWS ABOUT IT CUZ YOU TELL EVERYONE!! the other person i'm pissed off at is a certain someone who IS TAKING OVER MY LIFE! she has no idea that no one likes her and she keeps on bugging me!! she's stolen my friend and taken control of my website! heck! the first person i'm mad at tells her everything and not me!! OMG! THIS IS SOO FRUSTRATING!! GRRR!! NHFSDFKWAFJWHNB i am aware of my concequences that go with this post, but its worth the risk... i need to vent somewhere! oh.. and tracy don't get mad at me... (ur not one of the pple. but when you find out who they are, you'll be soo mad!)
i feel better now! byes!

In journalism. listening to the used. not talking in complete sentences. i need to find something to talk about! lol.. i'm so dang bored! i found out that the skate rink doesn't have public skating on thursdays so i need to find some other way to get out of the house. i need to get away! my mom twisted her ankle yesterday morning and got the day off work. i think i'm gonna wear my plaid skirt and army jacket tomorrow.. but not untill i find somewhere to go! ne one wanna go to the movies? i'm open to doing nething!! 
    LARS!! i have a few ?'s to ask you.. so call me asap! i probibally would've asked you them before you read this neway! 
       i've realized how much i like the used 1st cd while i'm listening to the 2nd one. the 2nd one doesn't even sound like them. this entry is soo retarded!! 
                      I NEED TO GET AWAY FROM LIFE! 
         i did the psat's today.. as did most of you! that test is both phisically and emotionally draining. 
         i dun think i like being alone! i need someone! lol.. newho.. i go to places... i am soo retarded.. and tired! i miss kristine..a... lol.. lars gets it! lol when you fall down a bottomless pit, you die of starvation... whatsherface, you can go to the thrift store, or junk yard... these clothes smell like grandma's! 
          SHOUT OUT TO DER!!!: i'm soo happy for you and tim! now all you need to do is hook up! life is going so well for you! lol.. 

         I'M OUTTIE!!!!!!

CALL ME WITH DETAILS!! ok.. back to being tired... i've decided i'm pathetic and really ugly! i mean common.. i like a guy who has a gf *cough*mike*cough* and i haven't had a relationship since august! i also like a guy my friend likes.. but look.. no one interested in me! :( i'm soo sad! lol... i mean.. boo hoo.. but i need to stop complaining! i'll do fine! i'm in fucking journalism class! how i long to leave and go home! next is stupid band.. that class makes me frustrated! i need to get away from everything! NJKLVCSHKSLDAFJO (that was my frustration at the world put into random capitalized letters!) i need to go home away from everything and everyone! i'm not in a good mood! *grrr* you know what.. i am soo bored with this site! BYE

AND HE'S NOT MAD AT ME.. call me if ur confused! i'm soo tired.. i have band next and all i wanna do is go home and eat cake.. CUZ ITS MY B-DAY! my gammy was up for the weekend. we got 6th at the competition.. but i probibally already said that!! lol... we get to listen to the tapes today in class.. i wonder what it says!?!? newho.. *YAWN* i'm overcome with bordom!! lol.. i'm jk! lol well.. i think i'm done here..unless you want me to be redundant! (cuz its my b-day!)

1. What color hair do you prefer in guys? doesn't matter.. but i seem to see a pattern in me dating dark haired guys... so probibally brown
2. Would you date a guy that's shorter than you? no... maybe if he was my hight
3. Would you date a guy that smokes? depends on looks.. but that'd be gross
4. Would you date an underage alcoholic? no....
5. Would you date a druggie? no. thats a stupid question
6. Is long hair in guys a turn on? YES!! but then again.. i dun care....
7. Would you date a guy with hair past his shoulders? probibally not cuz i'd be longer than mine!
8. Would you date a guy with hair longer than yours? no. we would get mixed up!! lol
9. Would you date a guy 10 years older than you? YES!!
10. Would you date a guy 5 years younger than you? no... maybe 1 year... but not 5! 
11. What's the biggest personality turn-on in guys? funny.. real funny.. and easy to talk to
12. What's the biggest physical turn on in guys? arm muscles and abs! 
13. Does politeness in guys make you wanna date them? yeah...
14. What personality trait is most important: um.. ok.. funny and easy to talk to.. i'm getting deja vu!
15. Would you date a really ugly guys if he was sweet? no...
16. Would you date a really hot guy if he was mean? maybe
17. What's more important: looks or personality? they're equally important.. cuz i'd be destracted from his personality if he was ugly and be all "ewww.. why'd i date him?" but then again if he was cute, but had mo personality.. well.. that'd be a pretty boring date!
18. Do you think guys find you hot? um.. no.. cute.. but not hot
19. Describe your perfect guy: cute, funny, smart, chiveralious (its not a word.. but go with it!), nice, easy to talk to, accually calls when he says he is!, fun to be with, seeing him makes my knees give way and my heart stop.. you kno.. MY WHITE KNIGHT!
20. Was the survey AWESOME or what? um.. it's better than some...
http://freedomfighter4.livejournal.com/12984.html

.:How many pairs of underwear do you own? lots.. i guess... i dun have THAT much spare time!!
.:How many pairs of socks do you have? not very many.. lol
.:Do you wonk? wonk?? what's that?
.:Where would the least romantic honeymoon be? in the back seat of a car.. a really old, crusty car...
.:How many toes do you wish you had? i don't.. maybe then i'd fall over!
.:What color are your fingernails painted? like i said.. whoever paints their fingernails has way too much time!!
.:Did you play with barbies when you were little? *sighs* yeah.. but only to shop off their heads
.:Have you ever said a cuss word in front of your parents? Yeah... and i got in trouble!
.:How was your first bike experience without training wheels? i dun remember.. but i remember my sisters.. she ran into the curb and flipped into my mom.. i've got the video tape as proof!
.:What's the worst experience you can remember when you were riding your bike? my 3rd grade b-day party and i was soo excited cuz pple were coming and i raced down the street and made a sharp turn going really fast and fell over and skinned my arms and knees and scratched my face.. so i was in pain for the party! 
.:What time was it 2 hours and 17 minutes ago? i'm tired and am not in the mood for math!
.:What is your full name spelled backwards? dnalrafcM accebeR assileM
.:What does your name mean? honey bee
.:Do you know anyone with the name Pierre? some guys french name was pierre in french class.. but not other than that...
.:How long have you known him? i dunt
.:Do you know a girl named Destiny? nope
.:What's the stupidest thing you've done in a Taco Bell drive thru? my mom was talking about how cute the guy was and i turned bright red and he laughed!! 
.:Did you wake up with a stuffy nose? thast a stupid question
.:How many of your friends have moved out of state? 1 that i can remember
.:Do you own rollerblades? yeah
.:Do you like Jeapordy? nope.. boring!
.:Can you do a puzzle with the pieces on the brown side? i can't even do one with the pieces color side up!
.:What size pants are you wearing right now? i'll leave it blank.. i'm fat
.:Are you even wearing clothes you perv? eww... i wonder who made up this stupid quiz!
.:Do you have a boyfriend/ girlfriend? not yet. 
.:How long have you been with them? i said no!
.:What are the top 6 most important things in a relationship to you? fun, love, faithfulness, friendship, respect, love (love is doubly improtant.. accually.. i couldn't think of a 6th one!)
.:Find a book, turn to page 1008 and read something off that page? none of my books have that many pages!
.:Do you like kinky stuff? ...do you?
.:What was the last thing you drank? orange soda!!
.:What was the last thing you ate? veggie burger YUM!!!
.:Are you intolerant to anything? cheerleaders... pple more stupid than me.. and annoying pple!
.:Do you like rollercoasters? YESSS!!
.:What are some hobbies of yours? singing, acting, internet, flute, watching tv, hanging out with pple, scoping out guys!
.:Do you think there is an epidemic of stereotypes? ummm...
.:Is there an elephant standing next to you right now? no.. but theres a nomad!!
.:Who are you talking to? bta and maria
.:What are you singing? "nothing" from a chorus line.. id u dun know it.. u need to be educated!!
.:Do you like polka dots? no.. they make me dizzy
.:How about stripes? more than polka dots
.:Does your eye itch? no... does yours?
.:What are you listening to? the voices in my head
.:Do you want a piggy bank? i have an empty one! do you have one full of hundred dollar bills??
.:Are we done for now? YES.. THIS IS MADNESS!!
